summary: A depiction of the off-screen relationship between the actors who play the newlyweds in the film Y la vida continúa (1992).
cast: Mohamad Ali Keshavarz|Farhad Kheradmand|Zarifeh Shiva|Hossein Rezai|Tahereh Ladanian|Hocine Redai|Zahra Nourouzi|Nosrat Bagheri|Azim Aziz Nia|Ostadvali Babaei|N. Boursadiki|Khodabakhsh Defaei|Ahmed Ahmed Poor|Babek Ahmed Poor|Mahbanou Darabi|Kardouni Nouri|Hossein Jafarian|Jafar Panahi
title: A través de los olivos
